official_title: A bill to establish a loan program to assist industry and businesses in areas of substantial unemployment to meet pollution control requirements.

summary.text: Pollution Control Facility Loan Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to make loans to any applicant to aid in financing any project within an eligible area for the acquisition, construction, rehabilitation, alteration, expansion, or improvement of a certified pollution control facility. Specifies the conditions for such loans. Stipulates that no loan shall be made which exceeds 65 percent of the aggregate cost of the project. Establishes in the Treasury a revolving fund available to the Secretary for the purpose of making loans under this Act. Authorizes the appropriation of $750,000,000 to be deposited in the revolving fund.
